SELECT tf.t_id tid, tf.td_code tdCode, tf.t_date date, tf.out_w_id outWId, tf.in_w_id inWId, tf.out_status outStatus, tf.t_type type, tf.remark, tf.in_status inStatus, tf.t_manager manager, tf.create_time createTime, cu.nick_name creatorName, cd.dept_name creatorDept, tfd.transferQuantity, tfd.transferAmount, inWh.w_name inName, outWh.w_name outName, mu.nick_name managerName FROM wh_transfer tf INNER JOIN (SELECT SUM(t_quantity) transferQuantity,SUM(t_quantity * g.wr_price) transferAmount, t_id FROM wh_transfer_details tfd INNER JOIN wh_stock stock on tfd.stock_id = stock.s_id INNER JOIN wh_goods g on g.g_id = stock.g_id GROUP BY t_id) tfd on tfd.t_id=tf.t_id INNER JOIN sys_user cu on cu.user_id = tf.create_by INNER JOIN sys_dept cd on cd.dept_id = cu.dept_id INNER JOIN wh_warehouse outWh on outWh.w_id = tf.out_w_id INNER JOIN wh_warehouse inWh on inWh.w_id = tf.in_w_id INNER JOIN sys_user mu on mu.user_id = tf.t_manager
and tf.t_id = #{map.tid}
and tf.td_code like concat('%',#{map.transferOrder},'%')
and tf.in_status = #{map.inStatus}
and tf.out_status = #{map.outStatus}
tf.in_status in('not_in_stock','partial_warehousing')
tf.out_status in ('partial_inbound','not_shipped_put')
AND date_format(tf.t_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{map.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(tf.t_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{map.endTime},'%y%m%d')
and cu.nick_name like concat('%', #{map.creator}, '%')
and tf.doc_status = 'done'
